item.title: New Blog, Old Me
item.description: Thanks to my teammate Roger, we’re on hugo, hosted on Netlify now! Expect many changes here, layout, posts, tabs, maybe even search bar!
item.content:
Thanks to my teammate Roger, we’re on hugo, hosted on Netlify now!

Expect many changes here, layout, posts, tabs, maybe even search bar!

And when I’ll learn how to do it, I’ll probably move again somewhere else with some extra powah!
